pr_title: [#10621] Add per receipient overall stats to weighted rubric

timeline.message: Add per receipient overall stats to weighted rubric
Add a breakdown for weighted rubric average
Update e2e test and html tag id

timeline.bodyText: Correct me if I'm wrong, but that Average column does not look like "Average". @moziliar (ref: #11196)
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

replies.bodyText:
Ok will look into this... I need to locate the root cause of this particular case...
The rest seem to be following the logic of averaging all the breakdown values

replies.bodyText: I think the fix needs to be against the release branch as it will have to be a hot fix for V7.
